name: AR Spider
description:
Beware! you're are being sieged by a group of different 3D spiders! How long can you last?

Find 3D animated spiders in augmented reality in the real world following the arrows, then use your net shotgun to immobilize and capture them. Once in the net, you will need to vaccine them shaking your mobile towards the spiders.

Be as fast as you can!

Challenge your friends and see who is the best hunter!

FEATURES:

• Find the terrific creatures around you. A green arrow will help you in your search

• Shoot a net or fishnet to immobilize the spiders

• Shake your phone vertically in order to vaccine and neutralize the spider with your syringe

• Compete with your friends and family on a local and global ranking

What’s next?

New creatures, More realistic augmented reality
